container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Residential Treatment Centers

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Residential Treatment Centers is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-109(a)(1) and (3), 19-118, and 19-120, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 amended effective June 26, 1981 (8:13 Md. R. 1140) and October 12, 1981 (8:20 Md. R. 1635)
Regulation .01 amended effective September 10, 1984 (11:18 Md. R. 1584); February 9, 1987 (14:3 Md. R. 274); August 16, 1993 (20:16 Md. R. 1277)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective October 18, 1984 (11:23 Md. R. 1990); adopted permanently effective January 14, 1985 (12:1 Md. R. 16)

Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective January 16, 1985 (12:3 Md. R. 242); emergency status extended at 12:10 Md. R. 959; adopted permanently effective September 9, 1985 (12:18 Md. R. 1766)

Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective January 1, 1986 (13:2 Md. R. 135); emergency status extended at 13:10 Md. R. 1152; adopted permanently effective June 2, 1986 (13:11 Md. R. 1273)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective April 25, 1986 (13:10 Md. R. 1152); adopted permanently effective September 8, 1986 (13:18 Md. R. 2020)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective August 13, 1986 (13:18 Md. R. 2017); adopted permanently effective December 15, 1986 (13:25 Md. R. 2659)
Regulations .01 amended and .02A repealed as an emergency provision effective April 2, 1992 (19:8 Md. R. 800); adopted permanently effective July 6, 1992 (19:13 Md. R. 1202)
Regulation .02 adopted as an emergency provision effective May 21, 1986 (13:12 Md. R. 1372); emergency status expired September 28, 1986 (Emergency provisions are temporary and not printed in COMAR)
Regulation .02A amended as an emergency provision effective August 13, 1986 (13:18 Md. R. 2017); adopted permanently effective December 15, 1986 (13:25 Md. R. 2659)
Regulation .02A amended effective May 28, 1990 (17:10 Md. R. 1219)
Regulation .02A amended as an emergency provision effective February 1, 1991 (18:4 Md. R. 445)
Regulation .02B adopted effective February 9, 1987 (14:3 Md. R. 274)
Regulation .02B amended effective September 5, 1988 (15:18 Md. R. 2151); May 28, 1990 (17:10 Md. R. 1219); July 29, 1996 (23:15 Md. R. 1088)
Regulation .02B amended as an emergency provision effective February 27, 1997 (24:6 Md. R. 481); amended permanently effective June 30, 1997 (24:13 Md. R. 932)

Regulations .01 and .02 under Chapter, State Health Plan: Overview, Psychiatric Services, and Emergency Medical Services, repealed and new Regulation .01 under Chapter, State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Residential Treatment Centers, adopted effective August 9, 2021 (48:16 Md. R. 631)
